title: Kullu Manali Adventure Tour
message: Join us for an exciting trip to Kullu Manali with snow activities and adventure sports. Departure on March 10.

title: Singapore Grand Tour
message: Experience the best of Singapore with a city tour, Sentosa Island, and Universal Studios. Tour starts on March 15.

title: Goa Beach Holiday
message: Relax on the sandy beaches of Goa with water sports, nightlife, and beach parties. Departure on March 20.

title: Royal Rajasthan Heritage Tour
message: Explore the palaces, forts, and desert landscapes of Rajasthan. Tour begins on March 25.

title: Kerala Backwaters Cruise
message: Enjoy a scenic houseboat cruise in the backwaters of Kerala with Ayurvedic wellness. Departure on March 30.

title: Andaman & Nicobar Island Getaway
message: Scuba diving, coral reef exploration, and stunning beaches await you in Andaman. Trip starts on April 5.

title: Ladakh Bike Expedition
message: Ride through the high-altitude passes of Ladakh and visit Pangong Lake. Expedition begins on April 12.

title: Shimla Winter Wonderland
message: Enjoy snow-covered mountains, colonial architecture, and scenic views in Shimla. Tour starts on April 18.

title: Rishikesh Yoga & Adventure Retreat
message: Immerse in yoga, meditation, and thrilling river rafting in Rishikesh. Retreat starts on April 22.

title: Ooty Hill Station Escape
message: Enjoy the cool climate, tea plantations, and misty mountains of Ooty. Trip starts on April 28.

title: Mysore Dasara Festival Tour
message: Witness the grandeur of Mysore Palace during the Dasara Festival. Tour begins on May 5.

title: Darjeeling Toy Train & Tea Gardens
message: Ride the heritage toy train and explore scenic tea plantations in Darjeeling. Trip starts on May 12.
